text: Vuga uti:- twaremeye Imana y’ukuri hamwe nivyo twamanuriwe nivyo yamanuriwe intumwa y'Imana Ibrahimu (iii) na Ismaili (iii) hamwe na Is’haka (iii) na Ya’akubu (iii) hamwe n’ibibondo vyiwe, hamwe n’ivyo yahawe intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) na Issa mwene Mariyamu (iii) hamwe n’izindi ntumwa zivuye ku Muremyi wabo, natwe ntituvangura hagati yabo n’umuntu n’umwe, natwe tugamburukiye kuri yo
